title: Apples
description: A round fruit with a firm outer skin that can be red, green, or yellow and a crisp, juicy interior.

title: Bananas
description: Medium to large blossoms ranging in size from 4 to 8 centimeters. Depending on the variety, the blooms can be simple, with one layer of ovate petals, complex with multiple layers of petals, or pom-pom shaped with a rounded appearance. The petals can be flat and ovate with a slight point, or they can curve upward to meet the next layer, forming a small cavity in each petal. The delicate petals surround a bright yellow center comprised of multiple pollen-covered stamens.The flowers emit little to no fragrance and have a velvety texture with a mildly sweet flavor and warm spiced undertones.

title: Mango
description: Hyacinth are small genus of bulbous herbs and most species have four to six narrow untoothed leaves that emerge from the underground bulb. The flowers are borne in a raceme cluster at the top of the leafless stems, and each flower stalk has a small bract (leaflike structure) below it. The flowers have an intense fragrance.

title: Orange
description: Hydrangea flowers are large and showy, with a round or conical shape made up of clusters of smaller flowers. They have a honey-vanilla scent.

title: Pineapple
description: Peony flowers lush and full appearance makes them a popular choice for bridal bouquets, centerpieces, and other special occasions. With their sweet fragrance and romantic charm, peony flowers are the perfect way to add a touch of elegance and sophistication to any floral arrangement.

title: Watermelon
description: Tulip flowers are popular spring-blooming bulbs known for their bright and vibrant colors.Their simple yet elegant cup-shaped blooms are held atop sturdy stems that rise above grassy foliage, making them a favorite for cut flower arrangements and garden borders alike. With their cheerful and optimistic nature, tulip flowers are the perfect way to usher in the arrival of spring and add a pop of color to any space.
